text:
Edit: Resolved via pulling a "fresh" onboarding secret

~Hello,~

~We've got everything running successfully on a devnet docker-compose based deployment, except for the validator container (e.g. `splice-validator-validator-1` , by default naming), which continually restarts with an error~

~But the core of the issue seems to be the onboarding secret not being recognized; here is the command we're using to start everything at the moment:~

~Any suggestions or advice?~

elements.text: Edit: Resolved via pulling a "fresh" onboarding secret
Hello,
We've got everything running successfully on a devnet docker-compose based deployment, except for the validator container (e.g.
splice-validator-validator-1
, by default naming), which continually restarts with an error
But the core of the issue seems to be the onboarding secret not being recognized; here is the command we're using to start everything at the moment:
Any suggestions or advice?

text: That worked - odd that the other was stale, we had generated the previous secret just a couple of hours ago, but regardless we're good now :+1:
